messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] trip to europe
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hey, Dar! If you fly into Frankfurt (lots of cheap flights come into there), drop me an email.  I could meet you at the airport and head you off onto the
messages.messageBody:
> We're planning a trip to Europe this winter, and maybe Hawaii soon, since
> Kilauea is flowing so close to the road...
>
> Dar

Hey, Dar!

If you fly into Frankfurt (lots of cheap flights come into there), drop me
an email. I could meet you at the airport and head you off onto the trains
or whatever. (The digs at my place ain't fancy, but durn cheap!)

FYI, if you're looking at train tickets: unless you actually figure out the
days, prices, etc, and know that Eurorail passes will be worth it for your
family, it may be cheaper to take advantage of special fares from in
country. (Family "Happy Weekend" tickets are about $25, for example) Email
me off line for more info.

brenda
